timeline.message:
[sonatype] update max retries to be 500

Signed-off-by: Alan Chiu <achiu@lyft.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can you update the docstrings to indicate the default? Also PR description please 😄
timeline.author: rebello95
timeline.diffHunk:
